channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游리 08:11 Dumping anxiety in the Cherkasy region. Find out, anxiety is still in:- Cherkasy district- Zolotonsky district
item.description: 游리 08:11 Dumping anxiety in the Cherkasy region. Find out, anxiety is still in:- Cherkasy district- Zolotonsky district#Cherkasy_ This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 06:58 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-mirorskaya territorial community- Chervono-Grigorivka Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 06:58 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-mirorskaya territorial community- Chervono-Grigorivka Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
